cause.description:
Mano en Mano is a non-profit organization with it's primary focus on poverty in Nicaragua.
Our goal is to raise global awareness to places that may get less attention than (for ex) Africa, and see that Nicaragua (for ex) is suffering as well.
The money donated goes 100% to the donator's choice of: -school funds for secondary education -house building -food and nutrition -medical needs
Visit www.manoenmano.org for more info
For more information, send a facebook message to Lauren or email her directly at Lauren3647@mac.com
Thank you for all your support!
1. Raise Awareness!
2. End extreme poverty!
3. Motivate children and teens to receive educational needs!
cause.mission: Raise awareness of impoverished countries in the western hemisphere.
cause.name: Mano en Mano
